title: ivaL tAn evaLO
sahitya:
ivaL tAn evaLO iLa mAmayilE ilakkiya shOlaiyin isaip-pUngkuyilO


anupallavi

  pavaLa vAyil vandu tavazhum nagaiyil cindu pADiDum peN pAvai panimalar idazh kOvai


caraNam    seyyat-tirumEni shilaiyAgum ivaL cintaiyellAm anbin vilaiyAgum nenjaik-
koyya varum vizhi kONattilE ennaik-kotta vandAL kAdal mutta vandAL nilavE
